jobs.text: At Bueno, I flourished as a Front-End Developer, where crafting pixel-perfect interfaces was my jam. Collaborating closely with designers, I juggled multiple projects, seamlessly integrating front-end magic with backend JavaScript and databases, all with an unwavering focus on detail.

At Together, I embraced the role of Front-End Developer, pioneering web-based video game projects and empowering designers to craft websites with no-code tools. Beyond coding, I was instrumental in democratizing design, sharing our creative vision with the world.

At BBVA, as a UX Designer, I honed in on enhancing the mobile app experience, tailoring designs to the nuanced needs of banking, insurance, and wealth market sectors. My mission: to elevate user interaction across various products, ensuring elegance and efficiency.

At Berrinche Studio, my brainchild, I spearheaded efforts to attract clients, crafting the studio's identity with a keen eye. Specializing in tech-heavy giants, we delivered bespoke websites, apps, and more, blending design and development to breathe life into our clients' visions.
